name: Impressionist Movment: Gasoline on Canvas
description:
Impressionist Movement: Gasoline on Canvas is a fan boat racing game through a series of Monet paintings, which you're going far too fast to appreciate. 

As races progress, your speed will increase (and it will never decrease. We hard-coded it.)

Your one means of changing direction (besides bouncing off walls) is a grappling hook. Aim with the mouse, and attach with the left mouse button. Press escape to pause the game.

Race through the levels as quickly as possible, managing your direction even as your fan boat gets wildly out of control. Post your best times!

Created in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2020 by GiantEvilMoose and Kleinzach.
